class.name: WarfareFamilyPdu
class.comment: Abstract superclass for fire and detonation pdus that have shared information. Section 7.3

class.name: FirePdu
class.comment: 7.3.2 Used to communicate the firing of a weapon or expendable.

attribute.name: firingEntityID
attribute.comment: ID of the entity that shot

attribute.name: targetEntityID
attribute.comment: ID of the entity that is being shot at

attribute.name: munitionExpendibleID
attribute.comment: This field shall specify the entity identification of the fired munition or expendable. This field shall be represented by an Entity Identifier record (see 6.2.28).

attribute.name: eventID
attribute.comment: This field shall contain an identification generated by the firing entity to associate related firing and detonation events. This field shall be represented by an Event Identifier record (see 6.2.34).

attribute.name: fireMissionIndex
attribute.comment: This field shall identify the fire mission (see 5.4.3.3). This field shall be represented by a 32-bit unsigned integer.

attribute.name: locationInWorldCoordinates
attribute.comment: This field shall specify the location, in world coordinates, from which the munition was launched, and shall be represented by a World Coordinates record (see 6.2.97).

attribute.name: descriptor
attribute.comment: This field shall describe the firing or launch of a munition or expendable represented by one of the following types of Descriptor records: Munition Descriptor (6.2.20.2) or Expendable Descriptor (6.2.20.4).

attribute.name: velocity
attribute.comment: This field shall specify the velocity of the fired munition at the point when the issuing simulation application intends the externally visible effects of the launch (e.g. exhaust plume or muzzle blast) to first become apparent. The velocity shall be represented in world coordinates. This field shall be represented by a Linear Velocity Vector record [see 6.2.95 item c)].

attribute.name: range
attribute.comment: This field shall specify the range that an entity's fire control system has assumed in computing the fire control solution. This field shall be represented by a 32-bit floating point number in meters. For systems where range is unknown or unavailable, this field shall contain a value of zero.

class.name: DetonationPdu
class.comment: 7.3.3 Used to communicate the detonation or impact of munitions, as well as non-munition explosions, the burst or initial bloom of chaff, and the ignition of a flare.

attribute.name: sourceEntityID
attribute.comment: ID of the entity that shot

attribute.name: targetEntityID
attribute.comment: ID of the entity that is being shot at

attribute.name: explodingEntityID
attribute.comment: ID of the expendable entity, Section 7.3.3

attribute.name: eventID
attribute.comment: ID of event, Section 7.3.3

attribute.name: velocity
attribute.comment: velocity of the munition immediately before detonation/impact, Section 7.3.3

attribute.name: locationInWorldCoordinates
attribute.comment: location of the munition detonation, the expendable detonation, Section 7.3.3

attribute.name: descriptor
attribute.comment: Describes the detonation represented, Section 7.3.3

attribute.name: locationOfEntityCoordinates
attribute.comment: Velocity of the ammunition, Section 7.3.3

attribute.name: detonationResult
attribute.comment: result of the detonation, Section 7.3.3

attribute.name: numberOfVariableParameters
attribute.comment: How many articulation parameters we have, Section 7.3.3

attribute.name: variableParameters
attribute.comment: specify the parameter values for each Variable Parameter record, Section 7.3.3

class.name: DirectedEnergyFirePdu
class.comment: 7.3.4 Used to communicate the firing of a directed energy weapon.

attribute.name: firingEntityID
attribute.comment: ID of the entity that shot

attribute.name: munitionType
attribute.comment: Field shall identify the munition type enumeration for the DE weapon beam, Section 7.3.4

attribute.name: shotStartTime
attribute.comment: Field shall indicate the simulation time at start of the shot, Section 7.3.4

attribute.name: commulativeShotTime
attribute.comment: Field shall indicate the current cumulative duration of the shot, Section 7.3.4

attribute.name: apertureEmitterLocation
attribute.comment: Field shall identify the location of the DE weapon aperture/emitter, Section 7.3.4

attribute.name: apertureDiameter
attribute.comment: Field shall identify the beam diameter at the aperture/emitter, Section 7.3.4

attribute.name: wavelength
attribute.comment: Field shall identify the emissions wavelength in units of meters, Section 7.3.4

attribute.name: pulseWidth
attribute.comment: field shall identify the pulse width emissions in units of seconds, Section 7.3.4

attribute.name: flags
attribute.comment: 16bit Boolean field shall contain various flags to indicate status information needed to process a DE, Section 7.3.4

attribute.name: pulseShape
attribute.comment: Field shall identify the pulse shape and shall be represented as an 8-bit enumeration, Section 7.3.4

attribute.name: numberOfDERecords
attribute.comment: Field shall specify the number of DE records, Section 7.3.4

attribute.name: dERecords
attribute.comment: Fields shall contain one or more DE records, records shall conform to the variable record format (Section6.2.82), Section 7.3.4

class.name: EntityDamageStatusPdu
class.comment: 7.3.5 Used to communicate detailed damage information sustained by an entity regardless of the source of the damage.

attribute.name: damagedEntityID
attribute.comment: Field shall identify the damaged entity (see 6.2.28), Section 7.3.4

attribute.name: numberOfDamageDescription
attribute.comment: field shall specify the number of Damage Description records, Section 7.3.5

attribute.name: damageDescriptionRecords
attribute.comment: Fields shall contain one or more Damage Description records (see 6.2.17) and may contain other Standard Variable records, Section 7.3.5
